flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emitsnlight from its tail. It communicates withnothers by adjusting the intensity andfflashing of its light.nThis POKéMON is attracted by the sweetnaroma of ILLUMISE.
VOLBEAT’s tail glows like a lightbulb.nWith other VOLBEAT, it uses its tail tondraw geometric shapes in the night sky.fThis POKéMON loves the sweet aromangiven off by ILLUMISE.
With their taillights lit, VOLBEAT fly inna swarm, drawing geometric designs in thennight sky. They move their nests if theirnpond water becomes dirty.
It lives around clean ponds. At night,nits rear lights up. It converses withnothers by flashing its light.
It lives around clean ponds. At night,nits rear lights up. It converses withnothers by flashing its light.
It communicates with others bynlighting up its rear at night. Itnloves ILLUMISE’s sweet aroma.
It communicates with others bynlighting up its rear at night. Itnloves ILLUMISE’s sweet aroma.
It communicates with others bynlighting up its rear at night. Itnloves ILLUMISE’s sweet aroma.
It emits light from its tail toncommunicate. It loves thensweet aroma given off by ILLUMISE.
It emits light from its tail toncommunicate. It loves thensweet aroma given off by ILLUMISE.
Il communique avec ses pairs ennallumant son postérieur la nuit. Ilnadore le doux parfum de Lumivole.
It communicates with others bynlighting up its rear at night. Itnloves Illumise’s sweet aroma.
Il communique avec ses pairs ennallumant son postérieur la nuit. Ilnadore le doux parfum de Lumivole.
It communicates with others bynlighting up its rear at night. Itnloves Illumise’s sweet aroma.
It communicates with others bynlighting up its rear at night. Itnloves Illumise’s sweet aroma.
It communicates with others bynlighting up its rear at night. Itnloves Illumise’s sweet aroma.
よるになると　おしりを　ひからせnなかまと　かいわする。イルミーゼのnだす　あまい　かおりが　だいすき。
밤이 되면 엉덩이를 빛나게 해n동료와 대화한다. 네오비트가n내는 달콤한 향기를 매우 좋아한다.
Il communique avec ses pairs en allumant sonnpostérieur la nuit. Il adore le doux parfum denLumivole.
Es kommuniziert mit anderen, indem es seinnHinterteil zum Leuchten bringt. Es liebt Illumises Duft.
Se comunica con otros iluminando su cola por lannoche. Le encanta el suave aroma de Illumise.
Di notte comunica con gli altri illuminando la suancoda. Ama il dolce aroma di Illumise.
It communicates with others by lighting up its rearnat night. It loves Illumise’s sweet aroma.
夜になると　お尻を　光らせn仲間と　会話する。イルミーゼのn出す　甘い　香りが　大好き。
みずの　きれいな　いけに　せいそく。nよるに　なると　おしりが　ひかりnてんめつさせて　なかまと　かいわ。
물이 깨끗한 연못에 서식한다.n밤이 되면 엉덩이가 빛나며n이를 깜박여서 동료와 대화한다.
Il vit aux abords des étangs. La nuit, son corps émetnde la lumière pour communiquer avec d’autresnMuciole.
Es lebt in der Nähe von reinen Teichen. Nachtsnleuchtet sein Hinterteil und es kommuniziert durchndessen Blinken mit Artgenossen.
Vive cerca de estanques de agua clara. De noche,nenciende la luz de la cola para comunicarse connotros de su especie.
Vive vicino a stagni puliti. Di notte, la sua codanlancia una luce intermittente per comunicare.
It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lightsnup. It converses with others by flashing its light.
水の　きれいな　池に　生息。n夜に　なると　お尻が　光りn点滅させて　仲間と　会話。
ひが　くれると　しっぽから　ひかりを　だしてnあかるさや　てんめつで　なかまと　かいわする。nイルミーゼの　あまい　かおりに　ひきよせられる。
날이 저물면 꼬리에서 빛을 내어n밝기나 점멸로 동료와 대화한다.n네오비트의 달콤한 향기에 유인된다.

À la tombée de la nuit, la queue de Muciole émet de lanlumière. Il communique avec les autres en ajustant l’intensiténet le clignotement de sa lumière. Ce Pokémon est attirénpar le doux parfum de Lumivole.

Wenn es Nacht wird, beginnt Volbeats Schweif zu leuchten.nEs kommuniziert mit anderen, indem es die Helligkeit und dasnBlinken dieses Lichts reguliert. Dieses Pokémon wird vomnsüßen Duft der Illumise angezogen.
Cuando llega la noche, Volbeat emite luz por la cola y regulanla intensidad y el destello para comunicarse con el resto. Aneste Pokémon le atrae el dulce aroma de Illumise.
Quando cala la notte, Volbeat emette una luce intensandalla coda. Comunica con gli altri regolando l’intensità enl’intermittenza della propria luce. Il Pokémon è attrattondal dolce aroma di Illumise.

With the arrival of night, Volbeat emits light from its tail.nIt communicates with others by adjusting the intensity andnflashing of its light. This Pokémon is attracted by the sweetnaroma of Illumise.
日が　暮れると　尻尾から　光を　出してn明るさや　点滅で　仲間と　会話する。nイルミーゼの　甘い　香りに　引き寄せられる。
しっぽの　あかりを　つかって　しゅうだんでnよぞらに　きかがくてきな　ずけいを　えがく。nイルミーゼの　だす　あまい　かおりが　だいすき。
꼬리의 불빛을 사용하여 단체로n밤하늘에 기하학적인 도형을 그린다.n네오비트가 내는 달콤한 향기를 매우 좋아한다.
La queue de Muciole éclaire comme une ampoule.nEnsemble, les Muciole dessinent des figures géométriquesndans la nuit étoilée. Ce Pokémon adore le parfum dégagénpar Lumivole.
Volbeats Schweif leuchtet wie eine Glühbirne. Zusammen mitnanderen Volbeat malt es mit seinem Schweif geometrischenFiguren an den Nachthimmel. Dieses Pokémon liebt den vonnIllumise verströmten Duft.

La cola de Volbeat brilla como una bombilla. Ante otro de sungrupo, la usa para dibujar formas geométricas en la oscuridadndel cielo por la noche. Este Pokémon adora el dulce aromanque desprende Illumise.
La coda di Volbeat si illumina come una lampadina.nAssieme ai suoi simili usa la coda per tracciare figurengeometriche nel cielo notturno. Questo Pokémon amanil dolce aroma emanato da Illumise.
Volbeat’s tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat,nit uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky.nThis Pokémon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.
尻尾の　明かりを　つかって　集団でn夜空に　幾何学的な　図形を　描く。nイルミーゼの　出す　甘い　香りが　大好き。
